verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8140><s%> bish-Nat year חֲדָ֗ה <S%H2298><s%> cha-Dah, In the first לְבֵלְאשַׁצַּר֙ <S%H1113><s%> le-ve-le-shatz-Tzar of Belshazzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4430><s%> Me-lech king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H895><s%> ba-Vel, of Babylon דָּנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1841><s%> da-ni-yeL Daniel חֵ֣לֶם <S%H2493><s%> Che-lem a dream חֲזָ֔ה <S%H2370><s%> cha-Zah, had וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> ve-chez-Vei and visions רֵאשֵׁ֖הּ <S%H7217><s%> re-Sheh of his head עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> 'al- upon מִשְׁכְּבֵ֑הּ <S%H4903><s%> mish-ke-Veh; his bed בֵּאדַ֙יִן֙ <S%H116><s%> be-Da-yin then חֶלְמָ֣א <S%H2493><s%> chel-Ma the dream כְתַ֔ב <S%H3790><s%> che-Tav, he wrote רֵ֥אשׁ <S%H7217><s%> resh the sum מִלִּ֖ין <S%H4406><s%> mil-Lin of the matters אֲמַֽר׃ <S%H560><s%> 'a-Mar. קַדְמָיְתָ֣א <S%H6933><s%> kad-ma-ye-Ta The first כְאַרְיֵ֔ה <S%H744><s%> che-'ar-Yeh, [was] like a lion וְגַפִּ֥ין <S%H1611><s%> ve-gap-Pin wings דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- forasmuch נְשַׁ֖ר <S%H5403><s%> ne-Shar and had eagle's לַ֑הּ Lah; חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> cha-Zeh looking הֲוֵ֡ית <S%H1934><s%> ha-Veit kept עַד֩ <S%H5705><s%> 'ad till דִּי־ <S%H1768><s%> di- forasmuch מְּרִ֨יטוּ <S%H4804><s%> me-Ri-tu thereof were plucked גַפַּ֜יהּ <S%H1611><s%> gap-Paih the wings וּנְטִ֣ילַת <S%H5191><s%> u-ne-Ti-lat and it was lifted up מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> min- from אַרְעָ֗א <S%H772><s%> 'ar-'A, the earth וְעַל־ <S%H5922><s%> ve-'al- upon רַגְלַ֙יִן֙ <S%H7271><s%> rag-La-yin the feet כֶּאֱנָ֣שׁ <S%H606><s%> ke-'e-Nash as a man הֳקִימַ֔ת <S%H6966><s%> ho-ki-Mat, and made stand וּלְבַ֥ב <S%H3825><s%> u-le-Vav heart אֱנָ֖שׁ <S%H606><s%> 'e-Nash and a man's יְהִ֥יב <S%H3052><s%> ye-Hiv was given לַֽהּ׃ <S%H99999><s%> Lah.

וַאֲר֣וּ <S%H718><s%> va-'a-Ru And behold חֵיוָה֩ <S%H2423><s%> chei-Vah beast אָחֳרִ֨י <S%H317><s%> 'o-cho-Ri another תִנְיָנָ֜ה <S%H8578><s%> tin-ya-Nah a second דָּמְיָ֣ה <S%H1821><s%> da-me-Yah like לְדֹ֗ב <S%H1678><s%> le-Do, to a bear וְלִשְׂטַר־ <S%H7859><s%> ve-lis-tar- side חַד֙ <S%H2298><s%> chad itself on one הֳקִמַ֔ת <S%H6966><s%> ho-ki-Mat, and it raised up וּתְלָ֥ת <S%H8532><s%> u-te-Lat and [it had] three עִלְעִ֛ין <S%H5967><s%> 'il-'In ribs בְּפֻמַּ֖הּ <S%H6433><s%> be-fum-Mah in the mouth בֵּ֣ין <S%H997><s%> bein of it between; שִׁנַּיַּהּ shin-nai-yah כשִׁנַּ֑הּ <S%H8128><s%> shin-Nah; tooth קוְכֵן֙ <S%H3652><s%> ve-Chen thus אָמְרִ֣ין <S%H560><s%> 'a-me-Rin of it and they said לַ֔הּ <S%H99999><s%> Lah, ק֥וּמִֽי <S%H6966><s%> Ku-mi unto it Arise אֲכֻ֖לִי <S%H399><s%> 'a-Chu-li devour בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1321><s%> be-Sar flesh שַׂגִּֽיא׃ <S%H7690><s%> sag-Gi. much
